snippet.title: Crossfire Legion - Update 1.3 Trailer - Future Games Show Gamescom 2022
snippet.description: Crossfire Legion developer Blackbird Interactive popped in to the Future Games Show to detail and launch Update 1.3 of Crossfire Legion, which includes new units, a new faction and a level editor. Check it out on Steam.
